play.db

Class DB

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.db.DB
  • Deprecated. 
    Use play.api.Database

    @Deprecated
public final class DB
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a high-level API for getting JDBC connections.

        public static void withTransaction(java.lang.String name,
                                   ConnectionRunnable block,
                                   play.api.Application application)
        Deprecated. 
        Execute a block of code, in the scope of a JDBC transaction. The connection and all created statements are automatically released. The transaction is automatically committed, unless an exception occurs.
        Parameters:
        name - Datasource name
        block - Code block to execute
        application - Play application (play.api.Play.unsafeApplication())
